text: Richard Clifford Taylor (born 28 January 1943) is an English rock guitarist and pianist. He best known as the guitarist and founding member of The Pretty things. Taylor was an early bassist for the Rolling Stones, but left the band to study at Sidcup Art College. He was born in Dartford, Kent. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:The Rolling Stones members Category:English rock guitarists Category:English pianists Category:English songwriters Category:R&B; musicians Category:Musicians from Kent Category:Writers from Kent
title: Dick Taylor
